name: Ziwei Doushu Rules DB
notes: This dataset encodes machine-readable rules to place main and auxiliary stars, five-element bureaus, and four transformations.
Direction: cw=順行(clockwise), ccw=逆行(counterclockwise). Positions are relative to a start palace (offset modulo 12).
Variants are provided where schools differ (e.g., 四化表 for 庚年化科/化忌對應).
